original_text: People who do not believe in Christ may ask you to eat a meal with them. Agree to go to his home, if you want to. Then you should eat whatever food they give to you. Do not ask questions about the food. Do not cause your thoughts to have trouble.
korean_text: 불신자 중 누가 너희를 청할 때에 너희가 가고자 하거든 너희 앞에 차려 놓은 것은 무엇이든지 양심을 위하여 묻지 말고 먹으라

sentences.original_text: People who do not believe in Christ
may ask you to eat a meal with them
sentences.korean_translation: 당신과 함께 식사할 것을 요청할 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: Agree to go to his home
Then you should eat whatever food they give to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그들이 당신에게 주는 어떤 음식이든 먹어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: Do not ask questions about the food
Do not cause your thoughts to have trouble
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 생각이 어려움을 겪게 하지 마세요
